Grammar_Elements.ReductionBranches

Class Branch

  • java.lang.Object
    • Grammar_Elements.ReductionBranches.Branch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProlongationalBranch, TimeSpanReductionBranch

    public abstract class Branch
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class that describes a generic branch object that forms a branching tree hierarchy
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Branch

        public Branch(Beat pitchEvent,
              int level)
        Parameters:
        pitchEvent - the Beat object associated with this branch
        level - the level at which this branch branches from its parent. A value of 0 indicates that this is the top level branch of the structure, and progressively lower numbers indicate progressively less hierarchically significant branches.

    • Method Detail

      • addChildBranch

        public void addChildBranch(Branch branch)
                    throws BranchingWellFormednessException
        Adds a branch as a child of this branch object.
        Parameters:
        branch - the branch to be added as the child of this branch.
        Throws:
        BranchingWellFormednessException - Indicates that adding the branch as a child of this branching object would violate a well formedness constraint.

      • setParent

        protected void setParent(Branch parent)
        Parameters:
        parent - sets a Branch object as the parent of this branch object if a parent is not already established.

      • getLevel

        public int getLevel()
        Returns:
        the level at which this branch branches from its parent branch. A value of 0 indicates that this is a top level branch.

      • getAssociatedBeat

        public Beat getAssociatedBeat()
        Returns:
        the Beat object associated with this branch

      • getChildBranches

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Branch> getChildBranches()
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable map that describes the child branches associated with this branch object and their associated levels.

      • getParent

        public Branch getParent()
        Returns:
        the parent Branch of this branch

      • getOrderedLevels

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getOrderedLevels()
        Returns:
        a list of levels of the child branches associated with this branch

      • getAllSubBranches

        public java.util.List<Branch> getAllSubBranches()
        Returns:
        all the sub branches of this branch, including the sub branches of its direct sub branches.
